record.title: ADJOURNMENT TO MONDAY, OCTOBER 22, 2007
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT TO MONDAY, OCTOBER 22, 2007 -- (House of Representatives - October 18, 2007)

[Page: H11755]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that when the House adjourns today, it adjourn to meet at 12:30 p.m. on Monday next for morning-hour debate.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentlewoman from California?
